text: The 1946–47 FAW Welsh Cup is the 60th season of the annual knockout tournament for competitive football teams in Wales. ==Key== League name pointed after clubs name. *FL D2 - Football League Second Division *FL D3N - Football League Third Division North *LC - Lancashire Combination *SFL - Southern Football League ==Fifth round== Six winners from the Fourth round and six new clubs. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Bangor City (LC)||3–5||Chester (FL D3N) |} ==Sixth round== Six winners from the Fifth round plus two new clubs - winner and runner-up of the previous Welsh Cup. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Swansea Town (FL D2)||1–3||Chester (FL D3N) |} ==Semifinal== Chester and Newport County played at Wrexham, Wrexham and Merthyr Tydfil played at Cardiff. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Chester (FL D3N)||3–2||Newport County (FL D2) |- |2||Wrexham (FL D3N)||0–2||Merthyr Tydfil (SFL) |} ==Final== Final were held at Cardiff, replay were held at Wrexham. {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Chester (FL D3N)||0–0||Merthyr Tydfil (SFL) |- |replay||Chester (FL D3N)||5–1||Merthyr Tydfil (SFL)'' |} ==External links== *The FAW Welsh Cup 1946-47 Wales Cup
title: 1946–47 Welsh Cup
